TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit LocalDataStoreSlot extends System.Object

summary.span: 封裝記憶體位置以儲存區域資料。

span.span: Encapsulates a memory slot to store local data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 會提供兩種機制來使用執行緒區域儲存區 (TLS): 執行緒相關靜態欄位和資料插槽。The .NET Framework provides two mechanisms for using thread local storage (TLS): thread-relative static fields, and data slots. - 執行緒相關靜態欄位`static`欄位 (`Shared` Visual Basic 中的欄位)，會標示屬性。Thread-relative static fields are `static` fields (`Shared` fields in Visual Basic) that are marked with the attribute. 所提供的更佳的效能比資料插槽，並啟用編譯時期類型檢查。They provide better performance than data slots, and enable compile-time type checking. - 資料位置是較慢且更難使用與執行緒相關靜態欄位。Data slots are slower and more awkward to use than thread-relative static fields. 此外，資料會儲存為類型，因此您必須將它轉換成正確的類型，才能使用它。Also, data is stored as type , so you must cast it to the correct type before using it. 不過，您可以使用資料插槽，當您有足夠的資訊，在編譯時期来配置靜態欄位。However, you can use data slots when you have insufficient information at compile time to allocate static fields. 如需使用 TLS 的詳細資訊，請參閱[執行緒區域儲存區： 執行緒相關靜態欄位和資料位置](~/docs/standard/threading/thread-local-storage-thread-relative-static-fields-and-data-slots.md)。For more information about using TLS, see [Thread Local Storage: Thread-Relative Static Fields and Data Slots](~/docs/standard/threading/thread-local-storage-thread-relative-static-fields-and-data-slots.md). 同樣地，.NET Framework 會提供兩種機制來使用內容的本機儲存體： 內容相關靜態欄位和資料插槽。Similarly, the .NET Framework provides two mechanisms for using context local storage: context-relative static fields and data slots. 內容相關的靜態欄位是標示的靜態欄位屬性。Context-relative static fields are static fields that are marked with the attribute. 使用這兩個機制之間的取捨是類似於使用執行緒相關靜態欄位和資料位置之間的取捨。The trade-offs between using these two mechanisms are similar to the tradeoffs between using thread-relative static fields and data slots. 結構可做為本機儲存執行緒的記憶體機制和內容可用來分別儲存執行緒特定與特定內容的資料。The structure serves as a local store memory mechanism that threads and contexts can use to store thread-specific and context-specific data, respectively. 建立時，common language runtime 會配置到每個處理序的多位置資料存放區陣列。The common language runtime allocates a multi-slot data store array to each process when it is created. 執行緒或內容物件過期之後，重複使用不同的函式來配置資料存放區中的資料位置、 儲存和擷取資料中值的位置，以及免費的資料位置的執行緒或內容呼叫。The thread or context calls various functions to allocate a data slot in the data store, to store and retrieve a data value in the slot, and to free a data slot for reuse after the thread or context object expires. 資料位置是唯一的每個執行緒或內容;其值不會在執行緒或內容物件之間共用。The data slots are unique per thread or context; their values are not shared between the thread or context objects. 依名稱或索引編號，可以將配置資料插槽。Data slots can be allocated by a name or by an index number. 如需儲存本機資料的詳細資訊，請參閱 < 或。For more information about storing local data, see or . 類別會搭配方法這類， ， ，和; 它未包含任何您需要使用它自己的方法。The class is used with methods such as , , , and ; it does not have any methods of its own that you need to use.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Finalize() cil managed

summary.span: 確認釋出資源，並在記憶體回收行程再利用 物件時執行其他清除作業。

span.span: Ensures that resources are freed and other cleanup operations are performed when the garbage collector reclaims the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 記憶體回收行程呼叫時準備好完成目前的物件。The garbage collector calls when the current object is ready to be finalized.
